SMW Subobject for ClosedImage: File:Crystal chest (closed).pngObject ID: 172Uses infobox: SceneryIs members only: trueIs variant of: Crystal chest

The Crystal chest can be found in the house directly south of the Witch's House in Taverley. The chest is locked and can only be opened using a crystal key, which is made by combining a loop half of key and a tooth half of key. Attempting to open the chest without the crystal key yields the message: This chest is securely locked shut. Opening the crystal chest grants an uncut dragonstone and a variety of other rewards.

Opening the crystal chest is a task for the medium Falador Diary.

Contents

    • 1.1 100% drop
    • 1.2 Possibility 1 - Spinach roll
    • 1.3 Possibility 2 - Runes

    • 1.10 Possibility 9 - Adamant sq shield
    • 1.11 Possibility 10 - Rune platelegs or plateskirt
    • 1.12 Possibility 11 - Nothing

Reward possibilities[edit | edit source]

Drop rates estimated based on 22,483 openings from the Drop Rate Project, unless otherwise cited.

The expected value of the crystal chest is 23,602.92. The cost of a crystal key currently is 22,038, while the loop and tooth halves together will cost 20,878.

100% drop[edit | edit source]

Item Quantity Rarity Price High Alch
Uncut dragonstone1Always14,493600

Possibility 10 - Rune platelegs or plateskirt[edit | edit source]

There is a 1/128 chance of rolling this table. When this table is rolled, female players will receive a rune plateskirt, while male players will receive rune platelegs.
